program: Master of Science in Electrical Engineering (MS)

sections.text: Caltech’s EE graduate program offers flexible, research‑aligned master’s study across circuits, signal processing, communications, and related areas.

items: At least 54 units of letter‑graded EE courses (100+ level)
27 units of mathematics courses (minimum grade C)
18 units of research directed by advisor
sections.text: Degree plans include EE lecture coursework, mathematics, and advisor‑directed research units within the 135‑unit requirement.
